  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3431</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3431</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Jazz web</string>
            <string language="en">Jazz web</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jazzweb</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Web de jazz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Web do jazz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Web di jazz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιστός τζαζ</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pàgina personal que presenta una breu historia del jazz, una selecció de midis i d'enllaços a pàgines d'interès. Conté un apartat amb informació sobre el jazz a Catalunya (locals de jazz, concerts i festivals i escoles).</string>
            <string language="en">Personal webpage providing a brief history of jazz, a selection of music (midis) and links to other pages of interest. It includes a section with information on jazz in Catalonia (clubs, concerts and festivals, and academies.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">jazz</string>
            <string language="en">jazz</string>
            <string language="es">jazz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">educació musical</string>
            <string language="en">music education</string>
            <string language="es">educación musical</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Persönliche Webseite, die eine kurze Geschichte 
von Jazz, eine Auswahl von Musik (midis) bereitstellt und Links zu 
anderen Seiten des Interesses. Es schließt ein Kapitel mit 
Informationen über Jazz in Katalonien ein (Vereine, Konzerte und 
Festivals und Akademien.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Page Web personnelle fournissant une brève 
histoire du jazz, une sélection de la musique (midis) et des liens à
d'autres pages d'intérêt. Il inclut une section avec 
l'information sur le jazz en Catalogne (clubs, concerts et festivals, 
et académies.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Web page pessoal que fornece um history breve do 
jazz, uma seleção da música (midis) e as ligações a outras 
páginas do interesse. Inclui uma seção com informação no 
jazz em Catalonia (clubes, concerts e festivals, e academies.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Web page personale che fornisce una breve storia 
di jazz, una selezione di musica (midis) ed i collegamenti ad altre 
pagine di interesse. Include una sezione con le informazioni su 
jazz in Catalogna (randelli, concerti e festival e accademie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσωπικό webpage που παρέχει μια συνοπτική ιστορία
της τζαζ, μια επιλογή της μουσικής (midis) και τις συνδέσεις με 
άλλες σελίδες ενδιαφέροντος. Περιλαμβάνει ένα τμήμα με τις
πληροφορίες για την τζαζ στην Καταλωνία (λέσχες, συναυλίες και 
φεστιβάλ, και ακαδημίες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jazz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musikausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jazz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">éducation de musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">jazz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">instrução da música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">jazz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">formazione di musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τζαζ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκπαίδευση μουσικής</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
